DOC.brief_summary: 1. Identify the tissue proteins associated with early breast cancer invasion phases without lymph node involvement . 2. Consider their role in the invasion and the risk of tumor spread .
DOC.brief_title: New Approaches for the Identification and Characterization of Functional Markers of the Risk of Extension of Breast Cancer Without Lymph Node Involvement
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer CCIS Invasive tumors Breast cancer tissues available in the biobank non availability of cancer tissue specimen
